articles.description:
For FTX customers who have been robbed blind: let’s use USD denomination at the pico bottom
But for this lawsuit we’ll go after people and use crypto denomination after market is at all time highs
Disgusting double standards in our justice system

medx: Celsius Network has officially sued me and thousands of innocent users in New York courts this week. Every single person & entity in crypto needs to be fighting alongside us against this bs. Because if we lose, it will affect every user of a cex. 
We are every day people who…

Not only did Certik’s security auditors move assets via sanctioned Tornado cash, they also dumped assets via ChangeNOW.
Which is a common set of patterns when Lazarus hacks protocols.
And Lazarus has hacked more CertiK audited protocols than any others…
So while I doubt the…

RT croissant
miss this week? np.
-crv founder liquidated for $140M
-terra labs settles for $5B
-djt runs to $300M
-gcr drops $100M bet
-arkham drops $150K bounty
-zachxbt summoned
-martin shkreli rugs half of CT
-free money glitch on kraken
-certik turns black hat
overall pretty uneventful.

articles.author: DeFi Educator
articles.description:
The German Government BKA (~German FBI) wallet sold ~6,5k $BTC in the last 6 hrs. 
It still holds 43k BTC, worth around $2.8 billion. 
The funds come from seizure of the Movie2k website operator
https://x.com/ArkhamIntel/status/1752761784639881396


Arkham: The German Government is now on Arkham.
The German Federal Criminal Police Office (BKA) seized almost 50,000 BTC ($2.12B) from the operators of http://Movie2k.to, a film piracy website that was active in 2013.
The BKA received the Bitcoin in mid-January after a ‘voluntary…
